original: khaṇā accenti māṇave.🔽Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca,
analyzed: khaṇāḥ accenti māṇave  yaḥ ca sītañca uṇhañca
translated: the young men waste the moment.🔽But he who thinks no more of cold and heat
he does not miss out on happiness.
Dabb grass, kuśa grass, poṭaka grass,🔽usīra grass, muñja grass, and reeds—
I will push aside with my chest,
